summary: Madison Square Garden, or MSG, is a famous indoor arena in New York City. It's the fourth building with that name and opened in 1968. The Garden hosts many events like hockey, basketball, concerts, and wrestling. It's home to the New York Rangers and Knicks sports teams. MSG is the oldest major sports venue in New York City and one of the busiest music arenas worldwide. It has had renovations, costing about $1.1 billion, making it one of the most expensive arenas.
title: Madison Square Garden
